attributes.action: REMOVAL OF ALL MPs THAT HAVE BETRAYED THE PEOPLE   ON BREXIT
attributes.background:
We Voted Leave the EU .  17.4 million people voted  ,it was stated
It will be Our choice 
Not the politicians 
Not the MPs
Not the cabinet Ministers 
Our choice  
The British Peoples Choice ..
MPs ignore us and are doing as they want not That of British People

rejection.details: Deciding whether an MP should lose their job is the responsibility of the electorate, not the UK Parliament or Government
